fields.name: Damaged-Replace
fields.description: Cutter is damaged and requires immediate replacement. This includes broken cutters, severely chipped PDC tables, or thermal damage.

fields.name: OK-Good
fields.description: Cutter is in good condition and can be kept as is. No action required.

fields.name: Braze Fill
fields.description: Cutter pocket requires braze fill repair to secure the cutter properly.

fields.name: Rotate
fields.description: Cutter can be rotated to expose a fresh cutting face. Partial wear allows for repositioning.

fields.name: Lost
fields.description: Cutter is missing or lost from the pocket. Replacement required.

fields.name: Build-Up Fin
fields.description: Material build-up on the fin/blade geometry affecting cutting performance.

fields.name: Pocket
fields.description: Damage or issue with the cutter pocket that may affect cutter stability.

fields.name: Impact Arrestor
fields.description: Issue with impact arrestor feature on the bit body.

fields.name: Body Build-Up
fields.description: Material build-up on the bit body affecting overall performance.

fields.name: Cone Section
fields.description: Center/cone area of the bit. First section from the center.

fields.name: Nose Section
fields.description: Nose section of the bit. Second section from the center.

fields.name: Taper Section
fields.description: Tapered section of the bit. Third section from the center.

fields.name: Shoulder Section
fields.description: Shoulder area of the bit. Fourth section from the center.

fields.name: Gauge Section
fields.description: Gauge/outer section of the bit. Fifth and outermost section.

fields.name: HDBS Type
fields.description: High Durability Bit System - advanced PDC bit design for extended run life.

fields.name: SMI Legacy
fields.description: Standard Matrix Impregnated - Legacy design with proven field performance.

fields.name: SMI New
fields.description: Standard Matrix Impregnated - New generation with improved cutter layout.

fields.name: Replace all damaged cutters in Gauge section
fields.description: Triggered when any cutter in the gauge section is marked with X code for replacement.
fields.output_template: Replace all damaged cutters in Gauge section. {count} cutter(s) marked for replacement in gauge area.

fields.name: Critical: Lost cutter detected
fields.description: Critical alert when any cutter is marked as lost (L code). Requires immediate attention.
fields.output_template: CRITICAL: Lost cutter detected. {count} cutter(s) missing from bit. Investigate cause and verify pocket integrity before replacement.

fields.name: High damage percentage alert
fields.description: Triggered when more than 50% of cutters need action (non-OK status).
fields.output_template: High damage detected: {damage_percentage}% of cutters require action. Consider full bit assessment before repair.

fields.name: Technical Engineer Approval
fields.description: Technical engineer must review and approve the evaluation results before proceeding to production.
fields.satisfaction_instructions: Submit evaluation for technical engineer review. Engineer must verify cutter assessments and approve recommendations.

fields.name: Cutter availability confirmed
fields.description: Verify that all required replacement cutters are available in inventory before scheduling repair.
fields.satisfaction_instructions: Check inventory system for required cutter types and sizes. Reserve cutters for this job if available.

fields.name: NDT Inspection Completed
fields.description: Non-destructive testing inspection must be completed and documented.
fields.satisfaction_instructions: Complete all required NDT inspections including crack detection and dimensional verification. Document results in evaluation session.
